dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: In a world where magic has disappeared, a young apprentice named Eryndor Thorne sets out on a journey to discover the truth about his past.

dialogues.speaker: Eryndor
dialogues.text: I've always felt like there's something missing in my life. Like a part of me is waiting to be awakened.

dialogues.speaker: Arin the Wise
dialogues.text: Ah, young Eryndor, you're feeling the call of the ancient magic that once flowed through our lands. But beware, the path ahead will be treacherous.

dialogues.speaker: Eryndor
dialogues.text: I'm willing to take that risk. I have to know what happened to my parents and why I'm the only one who seems to remember magic.
